BasePlugin module¶

class pyfluka.plugins.BasePlugin.BasePlugin(config=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Metaclass for guarantee of interface. Each plugin must provide initialisation taking optional configuration and invoke method taking data

Entry for plugin execution :param data (dict): input data :return: void
